bibl.title: Decline and Fall of the Roman City.
bibl.note: See in part. pp. 169-202: 5. Civic Finances in the Late Roman Cities of the East, with Special Reference to Egypt.
LIEBESCHUETZ J.H.W.G., Decline and Fall of the Roman City.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2001, 8°, xviii-479 pp., 3 figg., 22 cartes et plans. ISBN 0-19-815247-7 (hbk) / 0-19-926109-3 (pbk). £93 (hbk) / £38 (pbk).
